definition: Tiger Leaping Gorge on the Jinsha River 金沙江[Jin1 sha1 jiang1] in Lijiang Naxi autonomous county 麗江納西族自治縣|丽江纳西族自治县[Li4 jiang1 Na4 xi1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4], Yunnan
tiger/CL:隻|只[zhi1]
to jump/to hop/to skip over/to bounce/to palpitate
gorge

sentences.english: Tiger Leaping Gorge, we were caught in a traffic due to debris flow.
sentences.chinese: 從香格里拉到虎跳峽的路上，因泥石流出現堵車。

sentences.english: Not far from the city are the snowy Yulong Mountain and the Tiger Leaping Gorge.
sentences.chinese: 離城不遠處有玉龍雪山和虎跳峽。

sentences.english: It is very different than the Tiger Leaping Gorge case.
sentences.chinese: 這跟虎跳峽的情況是很不一樣的。

sentences.english: The next day, dangerous Tiger Leaping Gorge, Interview with the Tibetan family.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，險峻的虎跳峽，夜訪藏家。

sentences.english: Tiger leaping gorge is the world famous grand canyon, and grotesque known to the world.
sentences.chinese: 虎跳峽是世界上著名的大峽谷，以奇險雄壯著稱於世。

sentences.english: The far side of the mountain forms one side of Tiger Leaping Gorge (Hutiao Xia).
sentences.chinese: 遙遠的那一邊的一側是虎跳峽。

definition: Zogang county, Tibetan: Mdzo sgang rdzong, in Chamdo prefecture 昌都地區|昌都地区[Chang1 du1 di4 qu1], Tibet

Qinghai-Tibet railway
Namtso or Lake Nam (officially Nam Co), mountain lake at Nakchu in central Tibet
Zoigê county (Tibetan: mdzod dge rdzong) in Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang autonomous prefecture 阿壩藏族羌族自治州|阿坝藏族羌族自治州[A1 ba4 Zang4 zu2 Qiang1 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], northwest Sichuan
Mt Yulong or Jade dragon in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Himalayas
pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: Sêrtar county (Tibetan: gser thar rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Yamdrok Lake, Tibet
Gonggar county, Tibetan: Gong dkar rdzong, in Lhokha prefecture 山南地區|山南地区[Shan1 nan2 di4 qu1], Tibet
Mêdog county, Tibetan: Me tog rdzong, in Nyingchi prefecture 林芝地區|林芝地区[Lin2 zhi1 di4 qu1], Tibet
Kumbum (Chinese Ta'er), monastery in Qinhai, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
Rocky Mountains
Yarlung Tsangpo River, Tibet
Manas, hero of Kyrghiz epic saga/Manas county and town in Changji Hui autonomous prefecture 昌吉回族自治州[Chang1 ji2 Hui2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Xinjiang
